009package Ch15_ColorFilters;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear.ScalarMedianFilter;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear.ScalarMedianFilter.Parameters;
017
018/**
019 * This plugin applies a scalar median filter to all three planes
020 * of a RGB color image.
021 * @author WB
022 * @version 2013/05/30
023 */
024public class MedianFilter_Color_Scalar implements PlugInFilter {
025        
026        ImagePlus imp;
027        
028    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
029        this.imp = imp;
030        return DOES_RGB;
031    }
032
033    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
034        Parameters params = new ScalarMedianFilter.Parameters();
035        if (!setParameters(params)) 
036                return;
037        ScalarMedianFilter filter = new ScalarMedianFilter(params);
038        filter.applyTo(ip);     // apply destructively
039    }
040    
041    boolean setParameters(Parameters params) {
042                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Scalar Median Filter");
043                gd.addNumericField("Radius", params.radius, 1);
044                gd.showDialog();
045                if(gd.wasCanceled()) return false;
046                params.radius = Math.max(gd.getNextNumber(), 1);
047                return true;
048    }
049
050}
051
